intro: Pteris speciosa, commonly known as the sword fern, is a species of fern native to tropical and subtropical regions. It is characterized by its feathery, bipinnate fronds that are typically arching or upright. The plant has a rhizomatous growth habit, with creeping rhizomes that produce new shoots. Its leaves are usually bright green and can reach lengths of up to 1 meter. Pteris speciosa is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage and adaptability to various growing conditions.
